channel.title: Gadgets on Ksbigbass
channel.description: Recent content in Gadgets on Ksbigbass

item.title: MLF Fishing Scale
item.description:
Fishing Scale: ElectroSamson BrecknellÂ 

The MLF fishing scale: If you were wondering what that scale really looked like? This is the scale that has made the quick catch and release style tournament fishing the success it is. Now any club that wants to try and create their own MLF style tournament knows where to start.

[]

If you like the way the MLF weighs the fish and then immediately releases it, then you are a fan of this scale.

item.title: RTD: Rod Threading Device
item.description:
RTD: Rod Threading Device: Fishing Line Rod Threading Tool uses spring-loaded arms that take turns gripping the line gripper as it travels thru the line guides. The number of guides could be unlimited. May not work with all micro-guided rods.

https://youtu.be/R23FTKCCZ6E?t=90

Attach your line to the drop shot clip then pull the tool along your guides.

RTD-in -use-image rod threading device

item.title: Trailers: Magnetic Backup lockout Key
item.description:
Trailers: Magnetic Backup Lockout Key: With most trailers today having a trailer brake system on our bass boat trailers they encounter some issues occasionally.

This system works great, usually. The best tool to have handy a magnetic backup lockout key when this system breaks, because it most likely will happen to you at the most inopportune time, is this lockout buddy.

item.title: Go Eat a Bird!!!
item.description:
Go Eat a Bird!!! Bought a Save Phace now I am glad I did after reading a friends blog.

The story goes like this. Guy has a fast bass boat like a lot of us do. Running loaded down fairly well on a lake with heavy boat traffic that day. The pair were flying down the lake headed off to the next spot. That is when a group of coots surprisingly came out of nowhere. One of the biggest and slowest birds hit the trolling motor with the boat going about 70 miles and hour. Another bird hit the console and then hit the driver directly in the face.
